src:
Po zosnulom Emilianovi Salovi pomenovali štadión v meste, v ktorom s futbalom začal
02 Nov 2019, 13:35 by Webnoviny
2.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Po tragicky zosnulom argentínskom futbalistovi Emilianovi Salovi pomenovali štadión v meste Progreso, v ktorom s futbalom začal. Sala sa narodil v mestečku Cululú, neskôr sa jeho rodina presťahovala do Progresa. Emiliano Sala tragicky zahynul pri páde malého súkromného lietadla 21. januára 2019, ktoré sa zrútilo v Lamanšskom prielive pri ceste z jeho klubu FC Nantes do nového pôsobiska Cardiff City.
Zdroj: Webnoviny.sk – Po zosnulom Emilianovi Salovi pomenovali štadión v meste, v ktorom s futbalom začal © SITA Všetky práva vyhradené.
text:
After the deceased Emilian Salo named the stadium in the city where he started football
02 Nov 2019, 13:35 by Webnoviny
2.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - After tragically deceased Argentinian football player Emilian Salo named the stadium in the city of Progreso, where he started football. Sala was born in Cululú, later his family moved to Progres. Emiliano Sala tragically died in the fall of a small private aircraft on January 21, 2019, which collapsed in the English Channel on his way from his club FC Nantes to the new site of Cardiff City.
Source: Webnoviny.sk - After the deceased Emilian Salovi named the stadium in the city where he started football © SITA All rights reserved.
